name: Primary - GPS digital paintball - paint the world
blurb: Primary is digital paintball played using GPS.  Plant digital Colour Pulses and infect your opposition in your team's color.

rewards.reward: Where else can you get a fuzzy warm feeling for a few dollars?  We'll be forever grateful to you in playing your part in breathing life into Primary and we'll immortalize you on our donors page.

Vanity Player Name - choose your own player name in the Primary game before launch.  Don't settle for a  'DaveSmith32' type player name - have your perfect Primary name instead and be the envy of your friends (and enemies).\r\n\r\nWe'll also show a 'founder' label on your profile so other players know that you played a part in bringing Primary to life.

Beta Tester - Everything in the Vanity Player package plus an invite to Beta Test Primary before launch.  This is probably best done in conjunction with a few friends - being the only person in your area testing Primary won't be much fun :(

Tribe Tag - Your choice of 'Tribe Tag' next to your Vanity Player Name - showing the Primary Team you belong to.  As Primary evolves, you will be able to battle local tribes.  By registering your Tribe Tag now, you will be able to reserve the name of your sports team, school, college, company or street as a Tribe Tag.\r\n\r\nOh, and you'll also get a Vanity Player Name included.

Badge of Honour - Everything in the Tribe Tag package plus a set of bespoke Limited Edition Primary Stickers in your chosen Primary Color.  Your Tribe can wear your Primary badge with pride to show your Primary allegiance in the real World as well as the virtual World.

Kickstart Commando - Everything in the Tribe Tag package plus a special Kickstart Commando icon next to your Player Name.

Let the World know that you were one of Primary's founding fathers (or mothers).

We will also code a few special Commando easter eggs into the game just for players with your status and give you access to future premium game features before launch (we have a few ideas already for these and may build them in for launch if we over achieve funding)

Lifetime rental of a Primary Beacon (when this feature is enabled).  Choose a location and a color and we'll erect a Primary Beacon in that location that emits your chosen color for a 1/2 mile radius.  Anybody who checks in near to your Primary Beacon will be infected and you and your clan can use it to heal back to your Primary Color (or any color for that matter - choose green if you like - just give us the HEX code).  We're thinking that we might rent out Primary Beacons to fund the running costs of Primary in the future - this package gets you everything in Kickstart Commando plus your very own Primary Beacon.\r\n\r\nYour Primary Beacon will also serve as an advertisement for your business - literally branding your name on players as your Primary Beacon infects them.

Primary Tzar - we recognise that Primary has the potential to offer many more features and options than we have dreamed up so far.  We're open to inviting a number of enthusiastic off the wall individuals to come and play - helping us to define what we do next.  This doesn't represent any kind of ownership or rights to the product - merely the chance to contribute and help us plan where it might go next.  We'll throw in a Primary Beacon too.

Primary Admiral (RED Clan)  - status as one of 3 Primary Admirals - one for each Primary colour clan (Red, Blue and Yellow). Your Player Name will be embellished with a special icon that denotes your status as leader of your color clan. You will be immortalised in the credits screen for Primary. We will code a few Admiral easter eggs into the game just for you.

Primary Admiral (YELLOW Clan)  - status as one of 3 Primary Admirals - one for each Primary colour clan (Red, Blue and Yellow). Your Player Name will be embellished with a special icon that denotes your status as leader of your color clan. You will be immortalised in the credits screen for Primary. We will code a few Admiral easter eggs into the game just for you.

Primary Admiral (BLUE Clan)  - status as one of 3 Primary Admirals - one for each Primary colour clan (Red, Blue and Yellow). Your Player Name will be embellished with a special icon that denotes your status as leader of your color clan. You will be immortalised in the credits screen for Primary. We will code a few Admiral easter eggs into the game just for you.
